CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identify how this feature will be enabled for customers. Note: Customers on the "Do Not Auto Enable Features" list will never have features automatically turned on unless they request it.
CustomField.label: Feature Availability

value.fullName: Enabled for organization and end users -- Respects DNAE
value.label: Enabled for organization and end users -- Respects DNAE

value.fullName: Enabled for organization and end users -- Does not respect DNAE
value.label: Enabled for organization and end users -- Does not respect DNAE

value.fullName: Enabled for organization -- Requires system admin configuration
value.label: Enabled for organization -- Requires system admin configuration

value.fullName: Not auto enabled -- BT perm must be enabled by Customer Support or PM
value.label: Not auto enabled -- BT perm must be enabled by Customer Support or PM

value.fullName: Multiple features embedded in SO - See SO for enablement information
value.label: Multiple features embedded in SO - See SO for enablement information
